column4: hey all, getting err "/usr/local/winetools/Xdialog: error while loading shared libraries: libgtk-1.2.so.0" running wine.  specified dir does not even exist.  did install fail?  am i missing libs?  thanks in adv.
the winetools from winehq.com is not compatible with the wine in universe
you can use the wine from winehq.com instead
e.g., aptitude intsall wine=0.0.20050310-1 is what I did
